Bernie Sanders is right when he suggests that the FCC will have a hard time keeping Comcast in line. Once we allow companies to become this powerful, the FCC does not regulate them. They regulate the FCC, says the senator. The FCC will have a hard time saying no to competing companies that demand permission to create equally powerful combines. Howard Stern to David Letterman : sorry about your sex scandal( video) Instead of deflecting Howard Stern 's apology, David Letterman responded with candor and a bit of reciprocal praise. `` You have been very, very nice to me on the radio and viciously ugly to me on the radio and I except both with equanimity because I know a little bit about how you operate and I'm still fond of your talent and your ability and what you've represented to the United States of America-and of course, the world.
